text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump (3) numbers started tanking the longer you led the daily coronavirus press briefings. In other words, Trump being out of sight AND out of mind was better for our nation. You have to call up Fox News for an interview every time you feel the need to head off bad PR. No other...
